channel.title: White Supremacism and the Earth System
channel.description:
Howdy,
On our last OGM call, new OGMember, Angel Acosta, put a link to the post below in the chat window. It’s important reading for OGMers everywhere:
[https://www.resilience.org/stories/2020-06-08/white-supremacism-and-the-earth-system/]
Thank you Angel!
And I also recommend that you take a gander at Angel’s website to check out the work he is involved with:
[https://www.drangelacosta.com](https://www.drangelacosta.com)
